summary: Frontend-only testing of CarFinanças financial management system completed successfully. All requested features are working correctly: Login page with new design and Pedro Carvalho credit, Dashboard with Advanced Analytics section, Entradas/Saídas pages with Advanced Filters, and Month selector functionality.
passed_tests: Login page loads with new design (dark mode compatible)
Login page shows 'Pedro Carvalho' credit at bottom left
Login functionality works with provided credentials (Pedrohcarvalho1997@gmail.com / S@muka91)
Dashboard loads with 4 stat cards (Saldo do Mês, Receitas Recebidas, Despesas Pagas, Investimentos)
Dashboard shows 'Analise Avancada' section with all required cards
Maior Receita do Mês card displays correctly (R$ 3.234,78 - Salário Liz for Janeiro)
Maior Despesa do Mês card displays correctly (R$ 6.011,02 - Outros/Cartão Janeiro)
Previsão de Saldo card shows current balance, pending transactions, and 3-month forecast
Comparativo card shows vs Mês Anterior and vs Mesmo Mês Ano Anterior comparisons
Month selector works - successfully changed from Fevereiro to Janeiro 2026 using left arrow
Entradas page loads with correct data for selected month
Entradas page shows 'Filtros Avançados' section with all 5 filter options (Buscar, Categoria, Status, Valor Mínimo, Valor Máximo)
Entradas filters are functional - search filter shows 'Filtros ativos' indicator and 'Limpar' button
Saídas page loads with correct data for selected month
Saídas page shows 'Filtros Avançados' section with all 5 filter options
Summary cards display correctly on both Entradas and Saídas pages
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features have been tested and are working correctly. The system has backup data for Janeiro/2026 which shows complete financial records. Testing was performed on frontend only as requested. The analytics endpoints (/api/analytics/highlights, /api/analytics/forecast, /api/analytics/comparison) are working and providing data to the Advanced Analytics components.
